title: Living with the gun
creator_credit: Australia. Special Broadcasting Service, David Hirst and Valerie Morton
brief_description: Shows interviews with people in Los Angeles affected by guns. Helen Vatsikopoulos discusses with David Hirst the making of this documentary and its relevance to the gun debate issue in Australia which is both complex and emotive.
creator_credit_for_label: Australia. Special Broadcasting Service, David Hirst and Valerie Morton
description: Shows interviews with people in Los Angeles affected by guns. Helen Vatsikopoulos discusses with David Hirst the making of this documentary and its relevance to the gun debate issue in Australia which is both complex and emotive.
